title: Throwback
content:
Anybody know the 'ol Denver Nuggets font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130713103804im_/http:/typophile.com/files/qdcpbu7weno1htqgg5kk10i8o_6125.gif)
author: Renasci

comments.content:
I'm pretty sure that's custom (and ugly, in my opinion). It's like [Revue](http://web.archive.org/web/20130713103804/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?&q=Revue&x=25&y=7&sample_text=Denver%20NuGGets) goes Techno.

Someone may have developed a freebie Techno font to mimic this look.

- Mike Yanega
